name: BouliBrand Marketing
tag_list: stroumboulis, george, georgios, marketing, strategy, entrepreneur, start-up, media, web, websites, advertising, develop, social, database, consult, brand, advertise, stroumboulopoulos, greek, canadian, work, hire, resume, portfolio
overview: BouliBrand™ is a boutique marketing + communications + branding movement focused on creating vibrant, purposeful and revenue-generating media experiences on a partner-by-partner basis. With strategic partnerships in New York, Toronto, Athens and New Delhi, we work directly with savvy and optimistic clients wanting to produce fresh platforms of communication or target nouveau markets internationally. BouliBrand is driven by Georgios (George) Stroumboulis - an internationally seasoned marketing professional with tangible business experiences across multiple industries and diverse cultures.
